title: Gut Fauna
alt: I know it seems unpleasant, but of the two ways we typically transfer them, I promise this is the one you want.
transcript:
[Cueball on an examining table; Ponytail wearing a doctor's coat holding some test results.]
Doctor: I see the problem. Your gut macrobiome is out of balance. One moment.[Ponytail leaves.]
Cueball: I think you mean microbiome... Right?[Ponytail returns, slightly disheveled, carrying a momentarily docile live wolf.]
Doctor: No. Here, swallow this.
Cueball: That's a wolf.
Doctor: Do you need a glass of water?
